data.name: FurBalls Racing Demo
data.detailed_description:
FurBalls Racing is a platforming racing game that's easy to learn, but hard to master. Whether you want to have a party with friends or try to get perfect runs on every stage, FurBalls Racing is fun for players of all skill levels!

  • Choose one of six squishy animals in the demo, each one carefully balanced with their own unique stats!
  • Roll, wall jump, spin drift, and roll some more as you rush towards the finish line!
  • Eat food, then use it to... shoot poop?... at your opponents...
  • Play locally with up to four players in split screen!
  • Race against up to fifteen CPU players in Grand Prix!
  • Record and face your own best times as ghosts in Time Trials mode, where you can also race against staff ghosts!
  • Try to get gold medals (or the extra difficult platinum medals if you're fast enough) on every stage!

More content will be revealed when it's closer to release, so make sure to add it to your Steam Wishlist and stay tuned!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low quality, 480p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ultra Fuzzy quality, 1080p or higher

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
